animeTitle: Kimi no Hikari: Asagao to Kase-san.
animeDescription: "Please. I hope Kase-san likes me..."  Yamada is a shy second-year high school girl who is a member of the greenery committee. Kase from the class next to hers is a beautiful girl who is the ace of the school's track team. As a result of the morning glories planted by Yamada, the distance between the two people who have never exchanged words shrinks little by little.  (Source: Pony Canyon)
animeStaff: [['Terada Yuusuke', ['Producer']], ['Satou Takuya', ['Director', 'Episode Director', 'Storyboard', 'Key Animation']], ['Oku Hanako', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Takashima Hiromi', ['Original Creator']]]
